scripts.prebuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p='public/docs'; fs.mkdirSync(p,{recursive:true}); if(fs.existsSync('docs/logo-header.png')) fs.copyFileSync('docs/logo-header.png', p+'/logo-header.png');"
scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p='public/docs'; fs.mkdirSync(p,{recursive:true}); if(fs.existsSync('docs/logo-header.png')) fs.copyFileSync('docs/logo-header.png', p+'/logo-header.png');"
